sentences: Kõik need sured kingad läksid katki.
context: The Estonian word 'sured' (in the singular form 'niru') is an adjective used to describe something or someone of poor quality, worn-out condition, or bad state. It can refer to physical objects that are in bad shape or falling apart, conditions that are unfavorable, people who are weak or in poor health, or even situations and work that are unpleasant or difficult. The word has a negative connotation and is often used in colloquial speech.
